meanings.sent1: Whens will you arrive at the party?
meanings.sent2: I wonder whens the bus will come.
meanings.sent3: Whens you wake up early, the birds are still sleeping.
meanings.sent4: The mystery novel kept me guessing whens the culprit would be revealed.
meanings.sent5: Whens the sun sets, the sky turns beautiful colors.

meanings.sent1: Tell me whens you want to meet.
meanings.sent2: Whens we go to the beach, we always have a great time.
meanings.sent3: Whens the rain falls, the flowers bloom.
meanings.sent4: The concert was amazing whens the band played their hit song.
meanings.sent5: Whens the clock strikes midnight, it's time to celebrate.

meanings.definition: The time or times at which
meanings.sent1: I have marked the whens of our meetings on the calendar.
meanings.sent2: The whens of the train departures are displayed on the board.
meanings.sent3: The whens of the school bell ringing are always the same.
meanings.sent4: She kept track of the whens of her favorite TV shows.
meanings.sent5: The whens of the seasons changing bring new experiences.

meanings.definition: The time at which something happens
meanings.sent1: The whens of the movie premiere are still unknown.
meanings.sent2: Do you know the whens of the store opening?
meanings.sent3: The whens of the dog's barking always startle me.
meanings.sent4: The whens of the thunderstorm caught us by surprise.
meanings.sent5: The whens of the baby's first steps are precious moments.
